reference.shortdesc: A publisher is an entity (person, company, or organization) who makes information, literature, music, software, and other content available to the public.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The publisher element is equivalent to the Publisher element in Dublin Core.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows that the content is published by OASIS Open Printing, Inc:
